rows.label: qst701405_msg0001
rows.name:
OK then! Let's see if Kagutsuchi's
prepared Pestronella Oil is effective.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0002
rows.name:
Hikari, try walking over there, please.
In the interest of science!

rows.label: qst701405_msg0003
rows.name: Me?

rows.label: qst701405_msg0004
rows.name: Nope, I'm good.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0005
rows.name:
Not that I don't trust Kagutsuchi or
anything. It's just...

rows.label: qst701405_msg0006
rows.name:
I can't bear the thought of them
swarming around me! Ew!

rows.label: qst701405_msg0007
rows.name: I'll go.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0008
rows.name: Would you Shin?

rows.label: qst701405_msg0009
rows.name:
I'm confident this will work, but...
be cautious all the same.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0010
rows.name: Will do.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0011
rows.name: Hey, do you really think this'll go OK?

rows.label: qst701405_msg0012
rows.name:
Well, I followed the recipe in my notes
to the letter.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0013
rows.name:
But these notes are just something
my past me jotted down, so there's
no guarantee they're correct...

rows.label: qst701405_msg0014
rows.name: I'd say our chances are about fifty-fifty.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0015
rows.name: Only fifty-fifty?!

rows.label: qst701405_msg0016
rows.name: Looks like it's working.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0017
rows.name: Yes! We did it!

rows.label: qst701405_msg0018
rows.name:
So the recipe was right. Good job
past Kagutsuchi!

rows.label: qst701405_msg0019
rows.name: Indeed. Thank you.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0020
rows.name:
Right then. All we have to do is provide
some of this Pestronella Oil to Ivan.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0021
rows.name:
He's probably waiting for us. Let's
hurry back to Orem Storage Ward.
